body:
Are you someone that likes default, but is annoyed by the high fire, non transparent GUI, or no bow meter?

Well then this resource pack is for YOU.

Images- http://imgur.com/jlDjRVC,U5VlrPI,n3majhs,tfKw73d,QhLF9B0,nmtX7yB,E0M3cCq,7tSl07e,2tFKKto,gt4YV7P,2NM...

Link- http://www.mediafire.com/download/t46zz4sjej167v8/Default+PvP.zip

This pack, literally took me 30 mins, but its amazing!

This WILL help your FPS too, and the enchanted item glint is non-moving too so less lag.
